release_note: Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
Minor bugs fixed.
Export function of the sound adjusted by the equalizer is implemented. Fixed some minor bugs and brushed up.
Stereo recording with the built in microphone is now supported. Only compatible models are supported.
Added a custom segment for equalizer gain adjustment.
Fixed a bug that caused a crash when adjusting the playback position in the editing screen of a recording. Fixed a bug that caused a crash when deleting a selected file.
Added Equalizer function. Added save function to iCloud.
Minor bug fixes.
Supported iOS14.5 File name can be edited when recording is finished. Minor bug fixes.
Fixed force close bug during playback. Minor bug fixes.
Added batch delete function Minor bug fixes
Bug fixes and fine brush ups
Supported iOS13 Bug fixes and fine brush ups
Improved playback performance
Revived recording function in AAC format Improved operation when an external microphone is connected
Added playlist creation function Added function to recover deleted files Added conversion function from WAV to AAC UI improvements Bug fixes and fine brush ups
Minor bugs fixed
Supported iOS 11 Added file sorting function
The setting of input gain was to be able to ON OFF
Add the delete function in swipe from the list File sharing to add a standard e mail app
Bug fixes for iOS 7
Fixed a bug in the file editing functions

Change of UI Add a setting function of the input gain Add a setting function of the playback speed 0.5x 0.8x 1.2x 1.5x 2.0x Feed 10 seconds Feed 60 seconds Back 10 seconds Back 60 seconds Broken restoration of files WAV format only Bug fixes
Support iPhone 5 screen size
Trimming of a recording file Only WAVE format Repeat playback
